snippet: Why do we spend thousands of dollars a year on team fees? Why do we shuttle her to the field three to five days a week, 50 weeks a year? Why do we organize weekends around game schedules? Because it’s worth it.
abstract: Why do we spend thousands of dollars a year on team fees? Why do we shuttle her to the field three to five days a week, 50 weeks a year? Why do we organize weekends around game schedules? Because it’s worth it.

headline.main: The Crazy, Intense Schedule of Competitive Youth Soccer? Bring It On
